reviewText:
one of the  baddest live acts ever and this is prime and peak Kid Creole and the Coconuts.  also a time to remember nad pay respect  to  "Bongo" Eddie Folk  RIP who passed recently.  he threw down on those bongos
and had so much character and soul on stage. prayers go out to his family,friends
and fans worldwide.  this is a tight concert and showcases the musical versatility
and depth of the band. Kid Creole August Darnell is a musical beat on that stage.

"Don't Take My Coconuts," "My Male Curiosity," "Table Manners," "Mr. Softee," "Annie, I'm Not Your Daddy," "Laughing With Our Backs Against The Wall," "Mona," "Lifeboat Party," "Endicott," "Indiscreet" and "Caroline Was A Dropout." Recorded live at Le Zenith, Paris, France, September 10, 1985 on their "Leisure Tour." Digitally Mastered Dolby Surround, Mono Compatible. A 1986 EMBASSY HOME ENTERTAINMENT release. DVD release here: Live in Paris (PAL/Region 2) Some fine contemporary CD releases: OFF THE COAST OF ME,FRESH FRUIT IN FOREIGN PLACES,TROPICAL GANGSTERS,DOPPLEGANGER,IN PRAISE OF OLDER WOMEN & OTHER CRIMES
